original_text: Then the angel of the Lord said to Elijah, “Go down with him; do not be afraid of him.” So he arose and went down with him to the king
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 엘리야에게 이르되 너는 그를 두려워하지 말고 함께 내려가라 하신지라 엘리야가 곧 일어나 그와 함께 내려와 왕에게 이르러

sentences.original_text: Then the angel of the Lord said to Elijah
do not be afraid of him.
and went down with him to the king
